mathematica: e1[n_] := Total[IntegerDigits[n, 2]]; a[0] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = If[EvenQ[ n], 2^e1[n/2] a[n/2], 2 a[n-1]]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 50}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Mar 07 2016 *)
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {my(bd = Vecrev(binary(n))); prod(k=1, #bd, if (bd[k], 2^k, 1));} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 07 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
